usage_rules.headings: Use Manrope for all H1-H4. Tracking tight (-0.02em). Weight: Bold or ExtraBold for H1, Medium for H3.

containers.dashboard_card: rounded-xl border border-white/5 bg-zinc-900/40 backdrop-blur-sm shadow-sm hover:border-white/10 transition-colors duration-300

buttons.primary: h-10 px-6 rounded-md bg-blue-600 text-white font-medium hover:bg-blue-500 transition-all shadow-lg shadow-blue-900/20
buttons.secondary: h-10 px-6 rounded-md bg-zinc-800 text-zinc-200 hover:bg-zinc-700 border border-zinc-700
buttons.ghost: h-10 px-4 rounded-md text-zinc-400 hover:text-white hover:bg-white/5

inputs.default: h-10 bg-zinc-950/50 border border-zinc-800 rounded-md focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500/50 focus:border-blue-500 transition-all placeholder:text-zinc-600 text-zinc-200

calendar.cell: min-h-[120px] border-r border-b border-zinc-800/50 p-2 hover:bg-white/[0.02] transition-colors
calendar.header: text-sm font-medium text-zinc-400 uppercase tracking-wider py-4 text-center bg-zinc-900/50

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px, size 20px for UI, 24px for Nav

images.empty_state_illustration: Use abstract geometric shapes or minimal line art

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text-zinc-400 is only used for non-critical text. Use text-zinc-200 for body.
accessibility.focus_states: All interactive elements must have visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-blue-500/50).
accessibility.aria: Calendar cells must have aria-label with full date.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Ensure 'dark' class is applied to the root HTML element by default.
3. LAYOUT: Use the 'Bento Grid' strategy for the Dashboard. Do not create a generic list.
4. CALENDAR: Build a custom grid using CSS Grid for the calendar. Do not use a heavy library if possible, or style 'react-big-calendar' heavily to match the design.
5. FORMS: Use Shadcn UI patterns but override the styles to match the 'Dark Academia' aesthetic (darker backgrounds, sharper borders).
6. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all buttons, inputs, and calendar cells.
7. MOCK DATA: Create realistic mock data for lessons (Math, German, History) to populate the dashboard.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
